title: Microsoft Office 2003 - Word (with Spell Check) Portable
description:
This is a portable version of "Word" from Microsoft Office 2003.

No other programs are included, just "Word".

The Spell Checker is also included.

Enjoy.

Brought to you by eXPerience.

NOTE: When you close this portable app, if you see a screen pop up asking about Windows Installer, just click cancel. I don&#039;t know why but this does not always pop up. Only happens when you close Word and does not happen every time.

What do you expect from a 24.1Mb portable!
